findings: Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in adrenal gland with SUVmax 11.2.
Mild inflammatory uptake in adrenal gland region.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
